[00:06.39]Lyrics by：Julian-Quan Viet Le/Jhene Aiko Chilombo/Brian Keith Warfield/Maclean Robinson/Ross James O'Donoghue

[00:19.18]Go figure you were the trigger
[00:23.68]You brought me to an obstructed view
[00:26.21]When you knew the picture was bigger
[00:28.51]Who am I kidding
[00:30.81]Knew from the beginning
[00:33.28]You'd ruin everything you do it every time
[00:35.74]You are my enemy you are no friend of mine muh f**ka
[00:40.29]You muh f**kin' right
[00:42.16]You muh f**kin' right I'm bitter
[00:44.38]You muh f**kin' right I'm triggered
[00:46.95]You muh f**kin' right I 
[00:49.50]Wanna f**k you right now
[00:51.78]I just turned the lights out now
[00:54.19]And you know when the sun go down
[00:55.98]That's when it would all go down
[00:58.25]Been a minute been a while
[01:00.13]Ain't let nobody hit it since you hit it
[01:02.65]You know you always know what to do with it
[01:04.82]But ain't no me and you without you in it
[01:07.04]D**n
[01:07.70]I'm 'bout to burn this b***h down
[01:09.52]I think I need to lie down
[01:12.03]Cuz I'm not tryna wild out now
[01:14.75]But right now
[01:16.92]Don't know what I'm capable of
[01:18.76]Might f**k around and go crazy on cuz
[01:21.24]Might f**k around have to pay me in blood
[01:24.34]This ain't the way that you want it
[01:26.13]Might catch a case in this b***h
[01:27.65]Don't let me catch you face to face in this b***h
[01:30.24]Trying my hardest not to disrespect you
[01:32.68]After what you did man
[01:33.87]What you expected
[01:35.60]You muh f**ka
[01:38.00]You muh f**kin' right
[01:39.73]You muh f**kin' right I'm bitter
[01:42.21]You muh f**kin' right I'm triggered
[01:44.62]You muh f**kin' right I'm
[01:47.15]Tryna let the time fly
[01:49.48]
[01:51.85]Tryna let the time heal all
[01:53.69]Tryna let the time kill all
[01:55.52]Of our memories
[01:57.87]All you meant to me
[02:00.21]All that history
[02:02.60]All that's history
[02:04.72]I'll calm down eventually
[02:07.58]Fall back eventually
[02:09.45]Please call me back eventually
[02:12.71]Fall back into me
[02:15.24]Maybe I'm overreacting
[02:17.00]Baby I don't know what happened
[02:18.87]You know all of my bad habits
[02:20.69]You know it's hard for me to control that s**t man
[02:23.33]Cuz when I get mad I get big mad
[02:25.99]Should of never did that get back
[02:28.33]'Bout to feel the wrath of a menace
[02:29.93]In my bag in my feelings
[02:31.21]I'm a bad lil' b***h and uhh
[02:33.56]I'm triggered
[02:34.73]When I see your face
[02:36.28]Triggered
[02:37.08]When I hear your name
[02:38.64]Triggered
[02:39.52]I am not ok
[02:41.67]You need to stay out my way
[02:43.50]Triggered
[02:44.50]When I see your face
[02:45.82]Triggered
[02:46.78]When I hear your name
[02:48.21]Triggered
[02:49.08]I am not ok
[02:51.32]You need to stay out of my way
[02:56.17]You need to stay out of my way
[03:00.83]You need to stay out of my way
data.trans:
[ti:Triggered(freestyle) (Explicit)]
[ar:Jhené Aiko]
[al:Chilombo (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:06.39]//
[00:12.78]//
[00:19.18]现在想想 一切都是因你而起
[00:23.68]用花言巧语
[00:26.21]把我蒙在鼓里
[00:28.51]不想再自欺欺人了
[00:30.81]从一开始就该预料到
[00:33.28]你会毁掉我的人生 这是你的一贯作风
[00:35.74]你就是我的仇人 不应该和你成为朋友
[00:40.29]你说对了
[00:42.16]你说对了 我很痛苦
[00:44.38]你说对了 我又触景生情了
[00:46.95]你说对了
[00:49.50]想和你一夜缠绵
[00:51.78]将灯光熄灭
[00:54.19]天黑之后
[00:55.98]一切都会好转吧
[00:58.25]年复一年
[01:00.13]除了你 再也没有爱上过别人
[01:02.65]你总是会哄我开心
[01:04.82]可现在这一切都不复存在 你从我的生命里彻底消失
[01:07.04]//
[01:07.70]这女人让我怒火中烧
[01:09.52]或许我该冷静一下
[01:12.03]现在还不是发火的时候
[01:14.75]但此时此刻
[01:16.92]我还能做些什么
[01:18.76]也许该得过且过 然后丧失理智
[01:21.24]因为连虚度年华 也会让人付出代价
[01:24.34]你也不想让事情发展到这个地步
[01:26.13]我或许该给这个女人找点麻烦
[01:27.65]不要让我看到你和她在一起
[01:30.24]我竭尽全力 想要对你保持尊敬
[01:32.68]看看你的所作所为
[01:33.87]还妄想我会原谅你
[01:35.60]你
[01:38.00]你说对了
[01:39.73]你说对了 我很痛苦
[01:42.21]你说对了 我又触景生情了
[01:44.62]你说对了
[01:47.15]希望时间过得再快一点
[01:49.48]
[01:51.85]希望时间可以抚平一切
[01:53.69]希望时间可以抹去一切
[01:55.52]关于我们的回忆
[01:57.87]还有你对我的意义
[02:00.21]我们在一起的那些日子
[02:02.60]已经成历史
[02:04.72]终究有一天我会冷静下来
[02:07.58]学会放手
[02:09.45]最后再让我听听你的声音
[02:12.71]回到我身边吧
[02:15.24]也许是我反应过激了
[02:17.00]宝贝 我也不知道究竟发生了什么
[02:18.87]你知道我的坏脾气
[02:20.69]我就是控制不住我自己
[02:23.33]一生气就歇斯底里
[02:25.99]我真不该那样对你 快回来吧
[02:28.33]内心深处的怒火
[02:29.93]越烧越旺
[02:31.21]我就是个坏女人
[02:33.56]看到你的那张脸
[02:34.73]就让我回想起过去
[02:36.28]听到你的名字
[02:37.08]就让我思绪万千
[02:38.64]触景生情
[02:39.52]我很难过
[02:41.67]你该从我的生命里消失了
[02:43.50]看到你的那张脸
[02:44.50]就让我回想起过去
[02:45.82]听到你的名字
[02:46.78]就让我思绪万千
[02:48.21]触景生情
[02:49.08]我很难过
[02:51.32]你该从我的生命里消失了
[02:56.17]你该从我的生命里消失了
[03:00.83]你该从我的生命里消失了
